substats: Effect Res (until 30%, but only if you use Broken Keel) > Speed > HP% > DEF%

conesNew.notes: Increased Energy from attacks to cast Ultimate more frequently. Consider using Meshing Cogs if this Cone is at low superimposition.
Increased Energy from attacks and from getting attacked, to cast Ultimate more frequently.
Generates SP for the team and grants Asta extra energy regen. Requires speed tuning for Asta to grant DMG Bonus to allies, but a lot of enemies can ruin SPD tuning through slow/freeze/imprisonment.
Easy and consistent DMG Bonus when using with a Fire DPS. Works well at high superimpositions.
Good lightcone in general for advancing all allies forward, does not require high superimpositions.
